item.title: Trump’s Trip to Scotland Echoes an Earlier Visit, When He Applauded Brexit
item.description: Before his 2016 election, President Trump correctly predicted that the forces animating Brexit would go beyond the United Kingdom. But now most Briton...

item.title: Australia Says Gaza Situation Beyond ‘Worst Fears’ as Pressure Mounts on Israel
item.description: Some of Israel’s closest allies have stepped up criticism of its restrictions on aid to Gaza, where doctors and aid organizations say people are dying...

item.title: War Amputees Find New Purpose on the Golf Course
item.description: The sport helps Ukrainian soldiers who have lost limbs in the war against Russia to heal and to master their prosthetics, rehabilitation experts say.

item.title: Taiwan’s Mass Recall Vote Tests Its Democracy, and China’s Nerves
item.description: An unprecedented recall vote could hand President Lai Ching-te more power by ousting legislative opponents. It could also prompt a response from China...

item.title: Thailand Warns of War With Cambodia as Deadly Clashes Enter 2nd Day
item.description: More than 100,000 people have been displaced in the deadliest conflict between the two nations in 14 years.
